description: A Minecraft multitool for developers, server owners and players. This project has now been merged directly into the birdflop website and is still worked on there.

A registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit server host aiming to provide affordable and accessible hosting and resources. My role involves development of parts such as the website, support tools, game panel, and more.
Currently a developer for PiShock, I work on various parts such as the website, a desktop application, and more miscellaneous things.
Mineplace is a 3D reimagination of the popular reddit community, r/place. It allows users to place pixels on a large canvas in a 3D space, creating a collaborative art piece.
A website to browse curated free assets including overlays, PNGtuber models, emotes, and more. Search by category and submit your own finds to help the community.
A silly little moon themed bot. Interactions, Utilities, Fun!
